template.p: Odoo empowers you to manage every aspect of your construction projects effortlessly and efficiently, and its integrated applications ensure unparalleled success and client satisfaction.
The construction industries come in two parts:
A streamlined industry package for companies focused on simple jobs, rapid quoting, and efficient execution.

Ideal for teams seeking operational efficiency without unnecessary complexity.
A complete solution tailored for construction companies overseeing complex and multi-trade projects.

Perfect for companies needing structured workflows and high-precision project management.

template.p: ﻿﻿üéì Invoicing﻿﻿

Typically, work items products are priced in a scale-able fashion and billed based on delivered quantity.
Those are defined as service products with invoicing based on manual delivery.

ul.li: From the project, expose all related aspects you want to have at fingertips with the slider icon (üéöÔ∏è).
Open the Progress view. It captures all sale order lines associated to this project.
For each line, adjust the increment fields to capture delivered work since last invoice.

Once at the periodic billing moment, select those lines and trigger the delivery update.
This will update sale order to capture those increments and create a draft invoice.
